## Exercises

### Exercise 1

```{r data, message=FALSE}
nobel <- read_csv("data/nobel.csv")
dim(nobel)
#to specify columns and rows
```

26 variables and 935 observations, each observation is a Noble Laureate

### Exercise 2


```{r nobel_living}
nobel_living <- nobel %>%
  filter(!is.na(country), gender!="org",is.na(died_date),)

dim(nobel_living)
```

Got it! ☺️
